name: Fox Jones and the Treasures of El Dorado
name_original: Fox Jones and the Treasures of El Dorado
description:
Fox Jones and the Treasures of El Dorado is an arcade game developed by Evis Games Studio. It came out on 25-05-2003. It was published by Evis-Games Studio.
Fox Jones and the Treasures of El Dorado is available on PC.
